message: Instead of getting updates for every topic that's in a group, why not let the user decide which topics they're interested in by subscribing to them? You could still let the user know that a new topic was created on the Groups dropdown, but only have the number of unread messages come up for subscribed topics. I think that would reduce that amount of rows in the table that's storing users read messages too.
Or maybe just have a "Star it!" button on topics that you want to keep updated on. It might be interesting to see how many people Star each topic too.
Actually, I'm guessing it's probably a table that keeps track of unread messages...
